enhanced_by.reason: Both methods take a String input and append it to the element, but appendText specifically appends a TextNode.
Both methods take a String input and modify the element's text content, but prependText adds the text at the beginning.
Both methods affect the text content of the element, and text() retrieves the combined text of the element, which can be used to verify the result of appendText.
Both methods modify the text content of the element, and ownText() retrieves the text owned by the element itself, which can be used to verify the result of appendText.
